name: Docker in Docker
onCreateCommand:
docker run -i 
    --device /dev/kvm 
    -p 50922:10022 
    -p 5999:5999 
    -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix 
    -e "DISPLAY=${DISPLAY:-:0.0}" 
    -e EXTRA="-display none -vnc 0.0.0.0:99,password=off" 
    -e SHORTNAME=ventura 
    sickcodes/docker-osx:latest
